item.title: âŒ˜ Change macOS Icons
item.description: If you’ve ever thought about wanting to change the standard icons of any app or folder on macOS, you’ve come to the right place. It’s actually very easy, and can be done is just a few easy steps. You first need to find and download an icon. I recommend the site IconArchive, they have many high-quality icons. You need to download the icon in the .icns format, and if you’ve got a retina display, I suggest you filter for Large Icons.
